install.name: Advanced Order Manager
install.author: JM-Experts!
install.description:
JM-Experts Advanced Order Manager for Virtuemart!

Advanced Order Manager Component lets you manage your Virtuemart orders in a better manner.Using this extension, the possiblities for searching your virtuemart orders are limitless. You can sort your orders by the following options:
  • Order number
  • Customer First/last name
  • Email Address
  • Date range
  • Username
  • Company
  • Product Name/SKU
  • Payment Method
  • Address, State, City, Country or Zip
  • Coupon/Discount code
  • Order status
  • Export Feature

You may also want to check out the following resources:

  • Learn more about all JM-Experts! Extensions and Joomla Services!
